nodes.message: U_LOOTED is a special tag that is removed when the target is respawned.

nodes.text: There's this really neat broach around the neck of this giant insect. It could be worth a lot of money!
Hmm... there's definitely an impression in the Proach's shell where the broach is stuck. It looks like the shell grew around it.
I see something else stuck in the shell.
Looks like there's a bent dagger stuck in the shell... No, it was obviously designed to be bent. It looks a little like a boomerang.
I'll call it a daggerang. Maybe if I throw it, it will come back to me!
The broach is a green bug-shaped piece of jewelry with a purple glowing gem in it on a silver chain. It's really very ugly.
I don't see anything else of interest on this giant corpse.
It's not going to be easy to unclasp that tiny fastener while it's embedded in the Proach's neck.
Nimble fingers make light work.
Got it! I clearly could have a successful career in picking pockets for fun and profit.
Ugh. That fastener is tinier than I thought and that head is bigger than the average bug. I can't quite get my fingers on it.
Let's see if I can cut the chain...
Got it!
That chain is a little harder than I thought. Must be magical.
May as well try to get a grisly trophy while I'm at it.
Ugh. This thing is like cutting through wood...
Good thing I have a good dagger and strong muscles.
Yuck... it's an ugly mess, but maybe Gregor will turn it into Proach pudding or something.
Now I'll just slip off this ugly necklace...

Ugh... Uck... This carapace is quite hard.
I think I'll need to build up my fitness before I can cut through this.
Let's see what Gregor thinks of Giant Proach parts! This should make him happy.
This is got to be what the Queen Drat wanted me to bring her.
Ugh. This feels nasty.
I don't know what it is about this broach, but I do think that it would be a bad idea to try to use this thing in any way.
It feels like this is something very powerful and very cursed. It likely had something to do with the Proach's giant size.
I also get the impression that it has something to do with Drats - and intelligence.
Why should I give this Broach to the Drat Queen? Clearly it will only make her more powerful.
Maybe wearing this broach will make me smarter and more intelligent. It may give me incredible magical powers!
After all, what's the worst that can happen?
Aieeeeeeee!

When one is a hero then one must be able
To recognize danger without any label.
But if someone is foolish despite caveats
They may be transformed into one of the Drats.
I'll just put this carefully away so I don't have any trouble with it.
